H0.text: who can be called a man of god. Saints

H2.text: who can be called a man of god. Monks

H3.text: who can be called a man of god. prophets

A4.text: In Christian belief, a saint, also known as a hallow, is a person who is recognized as having an exceptional degree of holiness, likeness, or closeness to God.

A5.text: The title Saint denotes a person who has been formally canonized... by the church as holder of the Keys of the Kingdom of Heaven, and is therefore believed to be in Heaven by the grace of God.
